column4: dug Little help getting videos to play in mozilla...videos crash
what type of videos are you playing
you tube
rgr that, i couldn't play them either without installing java (the full version from sun, not the open source plugin)
the full tar?
i used the addons manager in firefox to do it.  if you go to firefox what addons are listed?
click on plugins, and see which java is listed
mine says java plugin 1.6.0_07
installing
yes because uve only used linux 5 days
install envyng
i did that...what do i do next?  if i reboot with the nvidia card it just shows a cursor - no desktop
i think if i could get into the command line or desktop then i could use envy, but i can't get that far
sweet.....you cant use envy from menu/system tools in icon menu on desktop?
only if i boot with the integrated gfx card
boot with the integrated card then and let envy find your drivers
it says nvidia card not detected - cuz it's not installed at the moment.  should i install it and boot with the igp card, and then try to detect?
yes install it then boot in whatever mode u can to get desktop then go to envy console and set it up
ok i'll give it a try.  back in a few.  did the java plug in work?
hmm in the synaptic manger or in firefox?
whats up?
